creator: Stein, Tom (Music industry expert), author.$$QStein, Tom
description: Readers will gain vital and accurate knowledge about the music business, how musicians get paid, the legal framework for business, and will learn to recognize and leverage opportunities through overcoming the inevitable obstacles to success in a rapidly-changing industry.The author offers...insights into the niche readers might fill with their career, and discover their unique path to success. Readers will come away with a greater understanding of the scope and demands of the music and entertainment industry.
series: Sports and entertainment management and marketing collection, 2333-8652$$QSports and entertainment management and marketing collection
Sports and entertainment management and marketing collection. 2333-8652$$QSports and entertainment management and marketing collection.
contents: The business of music is still business -- Developing your music career -- The artist as entrepreneur -- Business planning and development: early stages -- How to write a music business plan -- Create your business entity -- Marketing, branding, and sales: how to find your fan base and promote your music -- Music marketing: how to make an EPK (electronic promo kit) -- Networking in the music industry -- Seven steps to the sale: how to sell your music and yourself -- Get paid for your music, live venue performance contracts -- Industry trends, starting and growing your business as an entrepreneur -- A&R, streaming for artists, how to publish your music and get it on Spotify -- Odds and ends: making recordings, the sound check, and teaching music -- Entrepreneurship and psychology: how to improve your thinking to enhance success.
relation: $$Cform$$VPrint version: Stein, Tom The Business of Music Management New York : Business Expert Press,c2021$$QThe Business of Music Management$$Z990084680390107871
